name: dropdown-menu-13
title: Dropdown Menu 13
description: Dropdown with checkbox controls for UI elements

files.content:
'use client'

import { useState } from 'react'

import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button'
import {
  DropdownMenu,
  DropdownMenuCheckboxItem,
  DropdownMenuContent,
  DropdownMenuLabel,
  DropdownMenuSeparator,
  DropdownMenuTrigger
} from '@/components/ui/dropdown-menu'

const DropdownMenuCheckboxDemo = () => {
  const [showStatusBar, setShowStatusBar] = useState(true)
  const [showActivityBar, setShowActivityBar] = useState(false)
  const [showPanel, setShowPanel] = useState(false)

  return (
    <DropdownMenu>
      <DropdownMenuTrigger asChild>
        <Button variant='outline'>With checkbox</Button>
      </DropdownMenuTrigger>
      <DropdownMenuContent className='w-56'>
        <DropdownMenuLabel>Appearance</DropdownMenuLabel>
        <DropdownMenuSeparator />
        <DropdownMenuCheckboxItem checked={showStatusBar} onCheckedChange={setShowStatusBar}>
          Status Bar
        </DropdownMenuCheckboxItem>
        <DropdownMenuCheckboxItem checked={showActivityBar} onCheckedChange={setShowActivityBar} disabled>
          API
        </DropdownMenuCheckboxItem>
        <DropdownMenuCheckboxItem checked={showPanel} onCheckedChange={setShowPanel}>
          Invite users
        </DropdownMenuCheckboxItem>
      </DropdownMenuContent>
    </DropdownMenu>
  )
}

export default DropdownMenuCheckboxDemo
